message.content:
cs.CV, cs.RO, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.GR 

This paper presents an algorithm for segmenting 3D RGBD point clouds using a hierarchical graph-based approach. The algorithm uses depth, color, and temporal information to segment the point clouds. This work is related to computer vision (cs.CV) as it deals with segmentation of RGBD videos. Additionally, the algorithm can process videos of any length and in a streaming pipeline, which is related to robotics (cs.RO). The algorithm also uses agglomerative clustering, which is related to machine learning (cs.LG) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI). Finally, the algorithm uses graph matching, which is related to computer graphics (cs.GR).
